comments:
In today's noon build (I20060314-1200), I tried to add javadoc to a method and got an error. I have pasted the stacktrace below. There are really two problem's here:

1) The add failed. This coul dbe due to the fact that I just started Eclipse and my workspace was building. I'll try again when the build completes (it takes a while)

2) The "fromIndex(0) > toIndex(-1)" was given as the reason in the error dialog that was presented to the user. This might be useful information for someone but it shouldn't be shown in a dialog.

Here's the stacktrace:

Sorry, I didn't even look at the trace. The error is coming from the progress view. I also got it when I saved a file.
The problem seems to be related to the build (i.e. once the build completed, I could add javadoc).

The problem is actually to do with removing the last entry in the view.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 131397 ***
